title: [feature request] Be able to ask pytorchbot to rebase prs
body_html:
I think it would be nice if we could ask pytorchbot (very politely) to attempt to rebase a PR. If the rebase fails for some reason, ping someone (the PR's author? the user?), else pytorchbot updates your PR. (Can it do this?)

I see two potential use cases:

  • Rebasing stale PRs of community contributors so they don't need to rebase their PRs to get them reviewed. I think this is useful, especially because pytorch moves very fast.
  • Frequent devs might find this to be a nice convenience function.
